Introducing Gemini 1.0, our most capable and general AI model yet. Built natively to be multimodal, itâ€™s the first step in our Gemini-era of models. Gemini is optimized in three sizes - Ultra, Pro, and Nano

item.title: Attending the @WiNLPWorkshop at #EMNLP2023? Today at 11:00 AM, don't miss the panel discussion on tackling global misinformation challenges in generat...
item.description: Attending the @WiNLPWorkshop at #EMNLP2023? Today at 11:00 AM, don't miss the panel discussion on tackling global misinformation challenges in generative AI, featuring Google researchers @sunipa17 and @PreethiLahoti. Learn more: https://www.winlp.org/winlp-2023-workshop/
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Google is a proud Major Sponsor of the @WiNLPWorkshop, happening today at #EMNLP2023 with in-person and virtual attendance options. This year, WiNLP a...
item.description: Google is a proud Major Sponsor of the @WiNLPWorkshop, happening today at #EMNLP2023 with in-person and virtual attendance options. This year, WiNLP aims to highlight global representations of people, perspectives, and cultures in AI advancements. More: https://www.winlp.org/winlp-2023-workshop/
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We are happy to be a Diamond Sponsor of the annual @emnlpmeeting, which starts today in Sentosa, Singapore. Google Research has a strong presence at #...
item.description: We are happy to be a Diamond Sponsor of the annual @emnlpmeeting, which starts today in Sentosa, Singapore. Google Research has a strong presence at #EMNLP2023 with 65+ accepted papers and participation in 11 workshops and tutorials. See the full list at: https://goo.gle/3R7Q0o8

item.title: Coupled classical harmonic oscillators describe the physics of countless natural systems, from electrical circuits to molecular vibrations. Here we pr...
item.description: Coupled classical harmonic oscillators describe the physics of countless natural systems, from electrical circuits to molecular vibrations. Here we present a quantum computing approach to solve such problems exponentially faster than a classical computer. https://goo.gle/47JTOCY

item.description:
In case you missed it, check out Google Researchâ€™s contributions to WeatherBench 2 â€” #MachineLearning has made big inroads on weather forecasting in 2023, and we hope WeatherBench 2 can aid researchers and end-users as weather forecasting continues to evolve â†“


Google AI:â€‚The weather forecast is improvingâ€¦ literally! Introducing WeatherBench 2, a benchmark for the next generation of data-driven, global weather forecast models, providing data, tools, & an evaluation platform. Learn how to use it and check out the website â†’https://goo.gle/3YVUGAU

item.description: Project Guideline, a technology that enables people with visual impairments (e.g., blindness and low-vision) to exercise independently, is now open sourced and available for anyone to use to improve upon and build new accessibility solutions. Learn more â†“ https://goo.gle/3QNQfo3
